Title: Like Gene for Chocolate
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Rich Rinaldi
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Gene learns that the formula for his favorite chocolate has changed, so he works with the head of the company to fix the problem. In the meantime, Bob gets wrapped up in one of Teddy's not-so-perfect plans.
